main: ^Hiya sonny, what can I help you with?
^Well dang, it’s nice to have a new face around here
^It must be sad for you to come to such a rundown town
^But I hope you’ll find your place anyway.
^The name’s Sarah, and I love cooking
^Why I’m not in my kitchen working now?
^Well, you see sonny, the problem is the workbench with the sink has decided to break down on me
^And I’m not sure if just need a new workbench or if just need my sink fixed
^Wait you say you might know a guy?
^If you help me out ill make sure to make you something nice in return *smiles*
